react

Class IntValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • react.Reactor
      • react.AbstractValue<T>
        • react.Value<Integer>
          • react.IntValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueView<Integer>

    public class IntValue
extends Value<Integer>
    A Value specialized for ints, which has some useful methods. Note: this specialization does not mean "avoids auto-boxing", it just means "adds useful methods".

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class react.Reactor

        Reactor.RListener

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface react.ValueView

        ValueView.Listener<T>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IntValue(int value)
      Creates an instance with the specified starting value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int decrementClamp(int amount, int min)
      Decrements this value by amount, clamping at min if the current value minus amount is less than min.
      int increment(int amount)
      Increments this value by amount.
      int incrementClamp(int amount, int max)
      Increments this value by amount, clamping at max if the current value plus amount exceeds max.
      int incrementClamp(int amount, int min, int max)
      Increments this value by amount (or decrements if negative), clamping to the range [min, max].

      • Methods inherited from class react.Value

        create, get, slot, update, updateForce

      • Methods inherited from class react.AbstractValue

        connect, connectNotify, disconnect, equals, hashCode, map, toString

      • Methods inherited from class react.Reactor

        clearConnections, hasConnections

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntValue

        public IntValue(int value)
        Creates an instance with the specified starting value.

    • Method Detail

      • increment

        public int increment(int amount)
        Increments this value by amount.
        Returns:
        the incremented value. Note that this differs from Value.update(T), which returns the previous value.

      • incrementClamp

        public int incrementClamp(int amount,
                          int max)
        Increments this value by amount, clamping at max if the current value plus amount exceeds max.
        Returns:
        the incremented and clamped value. Note that this differs from Value.update(T), which returns the previous value.

      • incrementClamp

        public int incrementClamp(int amount,
                          int min,
                          int max)
        Increments this value by amount (or decrements if negative), clamping to the range [min, max].
        Returns:
        the incremented and clamped value. Note that this differs from Value.update(T), which returns the previous value.

      • decrementClamp

        public int decrementClamp(int amount,
                          int min)
        Decrements this value by amount, clamping at min if the current value minus amount is less than min.
        Returns:
        the decremented and clamped value. Note that this differs from Value.update(T), which returns the previous value.
